Detailed Description

Programme Execution Context.

This struct is used to keep track of a running child process.

Field Documentation

int exec_context::pid

The PID of a Process.

This is a unique identifier for a process.

int exec_context::exitstatus

The Exit-Code of a Process.

enum process_status exec_context::status

The Process's Status.

An IO Context to write Data to the Process's stdin.

An IO Context to read Data from the Process's stdout.
